meteringmethod: 3D Color Matrix Metering, Center-weighted average metering, Spot metering, Highlight Weighted

flashcompensation: -3 EV to +1 EV (in 1/3, 1/2 or 1 EV steps)
flashmodes: 1st Curtain Sync Auto Off Rear Curtain/Slow Sync Rear Sync Red-eye Reduction Slow Sync Slow Sync/Red-eye Reduction
